languages.text: {n}Кибелла медленно поднимает руку и касается краешка вашего глаза.{/n} "Зрение — друг твой и враг, ибо дано оно, чтобы прозревать деяния и быть слепым к намерениям. Я научу тебя видеть без глаз, Домин'{name}. Как когда-то научилась сама. Дозволишь ли ты зашить твои очи и провести тебя ритуалом обретения света — нитью, что не видна обычному взору?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Культистка медленно поднимает руку и касается краешка вашего глаза.{/n} "Зрение — друг твой и враг, ибо дано оно, чтобы прозревать деяния и быть слепо к намерениям. Я научу тебя видеть без глаз, Эним'{name}. Дозволишь ли ты зашить твои очки и провести тебя Кан'Шин — стезей, что не видна обычному взору?"

languages.text: {n}She slowly brings a hand to your face and touches the corner of your eye.{/n} "Sight is your ally and your foe, for it exists only to perceive deeds and be oblivious to intentions. I will teach you to see without eyes, Domin'{name}, as I was taught once. Will you permit me to sew your eyes shut and guide you through the ritual, along a thread unseen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла медленно поднимает руку и касается краешка вашего глаза.{/n} "Зрение — друг твой и враг, ибо дано оно, чтобы прозревать деяния и быть слепым к намерениям. Я научу тебя видеть без глаз, Домин'{name}. Как когда-то научилась сама. Дозволишь ли ты зашить твои очи и провести тебя ритуалом обретения света — нитью, что не видна обычному взору?"

traits.locale_text: {n}She slowly brings a hand to your face and touches the corner of your eye.{/n} "Sight is your ally and your foe, for it exists to perceive deeds and be oblivious to intentions. I will teach you to see without eyes, Enim'{name}, as I was taught once. Will you permit me to sew your eyes and guide you through Kan'shin, down a way unseen?"

I will teach you to see without eyes, Enim'{name}, as I was taught once. Will you permit me to sew your eyes and guide you through Kan'shin, down a way unseen?"

I will teach you to see without eyes, Enim'{name}, as I was taught once. Will you permit me to sew your eyes and guide you through Kan'shin, down a way unseen?"

{n}She slowly brings a hand to your face and touches the corner of your eye.{/n} "Sight is your ally and your foe, for it exists only to perceive deeds and be oblivious to intentions. I will teach you to see without eyes, Domin'{name}, as I was taught once. Will you permit me to sew your eyes shut and guide you through the ritual, along a thread unseen?"

{n}She slowly brings a hand to your face and touches the corner of your eye.{/n} "Sight is your ally and your foe, for it exists only to perceive deeds and be oblivious to intentions. I will teach you to see without eyes, Domin'{name}, as I was taught once. Will you permit me to sew your eyes shut and guide you through the ritual, along a thread unseen?"

languages.text: {n}Sie hebt langsam ihre Hand zu deinem Gesicht und berührt deinen Augenwinkel.{/n} "Das Augenlicht ist Euer Verbündeter und Euer Feind, denn es existiert nur, um Taten wahrzunehmen, Absichten jedoch nicht zu erkennen. Ich werde Euch lehren, ohne Augen zu sehen, Domin'{name}, wie auch ich es einst gelernt habe. Gestattet Ihr mir, Eure Augen zuzunähen und Euch an einem unsichtbaren Faden durch das Ritual zu führen?"
languages.original_text: {n}She slowly brings a hand to your face and touches the corner of your eye.{/n} "Sight is your ally and your foe, for it exists only to perceive deeds and be oblivious to intentions. I will teach you to see without eyes, Domin'{name}, as I was taught once. Will you permit me to sew your eyes shut and guide you through the ritual, along a thread unseen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie hebt langsam ihre Hand zu deinem Gesicht und berührt deinen Augenwinkel.{/n} "Das Augenlicht ist Euer Verbündeter und Euer Feind, denn es existiert nur, um Taten wahrzunehmen, Absichten jedoch nicht zu erkennen. Ich werde Euch lehren, ohne Augen zu sehen, Domin'{name}, wie auch ich es einst gelernt habe. Gestattet Ihr mir, Eure Augen zuzunähen und Euch an einem unsichtbaren Faden durch das Ritual zu führen?"

languages.text: {n}Lleva lentamente una mano hasta tu rostro y toca el borde de tu párpado.{/n} «La vista es una aliada y una enemiga, pues solo existe para percibir actos, ciega a las intenciones. L{mf|e|a} enseñaré a ver sin ojos, Domin'{name}, al igual que me enseñaron a mí. ¿Me permitirá coser sus ojos y guiarl{mf|e|a} por el ritual, siguiendo un hilo invisible?».
languages.original_text: {n}She slowly brings a hand to your face and touches the corner of your eye.{/n} "Sight is your ally and your foe, for it exists only to perceive deeds and be oblivious to intentions. I will teach you to see without eyes, Domin'{name}, as I was taught once. Will you permit me to sew your eyes shut and guide you through the ritual, along a thread unseen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Lleva lentamente una mano hasta tu rostro y toca el borde de tu párpado.{/n} «La vista es una aliada y una enemiga, pues solo existe para percibir actos, ciega a las intenciones. L{mf|e|a} enseñaré a ver sin ojos, Domin'{name}, al igual que me enseñaron a mí. ¿Me permitirá coser sus ojos y guiarl{mf|e|a} por el ritual, siguiendo un hilo invisible?».

languages.text: {n}彼女は、ゆっくりとあなたの顔に手をやり、その目じりへと触れる。{/n}「視覚は、あなたの味方であり敵である。なぜなら、それは行為を認識するためだけに存在し、その意図には気づけないのだから。目を使わずに見る方法を教えてあげるわ、ドミン・{name}。私自身がかつて教わった方法で。あなたの目を縫い閉じ、見えない糸を通って儀式を案内する許可をいただけるかしら？」
languages.original_text: {n}She slowly brings a hand to your face and touches the corner of your eye.{/n} "Sight is your ally and your foe, for it exists only to perceive deeds and be oblivious to intentions. I will teach you to see without eyes, Domin'{name}, as I was taught once. Will you permit me to sew your eyes shut and guide you through the ritual, along a thread unseen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は、ゆっくりとあなたの顔に手をやり、その目じりへと触れる。{/n}「視覚は、あなたの味方であり敵である。なぜなら、それは行為を認識するためだけに存在し、その意図には気づけないのだから。目を使わずに見る方法を教えてあげるわ、ドミン・{name}。私自身がかつて教わった方法で。あなたの目を縫い閉じ、見えない糸を通って儀式を案内する許可をいただけるかしら？」

languages.text: {n}她将一只手慢慢搭在你的脸上，抚摸着你的眼角。{/n}“视觉是你的盟友，也是你的敌人，因为尽管它能让你感知他人的行为，但却会让你忽视他人的意图。我要传授你不用双眼看到外物的技巧，秘者{name}，就像我曾经学到的那样。你愿意允许我将你的双眼缝起来，带你沿着目不可视的丝线前进，完成这场祭礼吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}She slowly brings a hand to your face and touches the corner of your eye.{/n} "Sight is your ally and your foe, for it exists only to perceive deeds and be oblivious to intentions. I will teach you to see without eyes, Domin'{name}, as I was taught once. Will you permit me to sew your eyes shut and guide you through the ritual, along a thread unseen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}她将一只手慢慢搭在你的脸上，抚摸着你的眼角。{/n}“视觉是你的盟友，也是你的敌人，因为尽管它能让你感知他人的行为，但却会让你忽视他人的意图。我要传授你不用双眼看到外物的技巧，秘者{name}，就像我曾经学到的那样。你愿意允许我将你的双眼缝起来，带你沿着目不可视的丝线前进，完成这场祭礼吗？”

languages.text: {n}Elle approche lentement une main de votre visage et touche le coin de l'un de vos yeux.{/n} « La vue est autant une alliée qu'une ennemie, car elle n'existe que pour percevoir les actes tout en restant aveugle aux intentions. Je vais vous apprendre à voir sans vos yeux, Domin'{name}, comme je l'ai moi-même appris autrefois. Me permettez-vous de vous coudre les paupières et de vous guider sur le fil invisible du rituel ? »
languages.original_text: {n}She slowly brings a hand to your face and touches the corner of your eye.{/n} "Sight is your ally and your foe, for it exists only to perceive deeds and be oblivious to intentions. I will teach you to see without eyes, Domin'{name}, as I was taught once. Will you permit me to sew your eyes shut and guide you through the ritual, along a thread unseen?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle approche lentement une main de votre visage et touche le coin de l'un de vos yeux.{/n} « La vue est autant une alliée qu'une ennemie, car elle n'existe que pour percevoir les actes tout en restant aveugle aux intentions. Je vais vous apprendre à voir sans vos yeux, Domin'{name}, comme je l'ai moi-même appris autrefois. Me permettez-vous de vous coudre les paupières et de vous guider sur le fil invisible du rituel ? »

languages.text: {n}Bir elini yavaşça yüzüne getirerek gözünün kenarına dokunuyor.{/n} "Görüşün, hem müttefikin hem de hasmındır. Çünkü yalnızca eylemleri algılamak ve niyetlere ilgisiz kalmak için vardır. Domin'{name}, bir zamanlar bana öğretildiği gibi sana da gözlerini kullanmadan görmeyi öğreteceğim. Gözlerini dikip kapatmama ve ayinde sana görünmez bir iplik üzerinde kılavuzluk etmeme müsaade edecek misin?"
languages.original_text: {n}She slowly brings a hand to your face and touches the corner of your eye.{/n} "Sight is your ally and your foe, for it exists only to perceive deeds and be oblivious to intentions. I will teach you to see without eyes, Domin'{name}, as I was taught once. Will you permit me to sew your eyes shut and guide you through the ritual, along a thread unseen?"
